renderCell

public java.lang.String renderCell(IClientContext context,
                                   IBrowser browser,
                                   IDataBrowserRecord record,
                                   int row,
                                   java.lang.String cellContent)
Return the HTML content (the part between the TD tag) of the cell.

Parameters:
context -
record - the related record
row - the current row index. Can be used for even/odd rendering (zebra)
cellContent - The raw content to render. This has may be filtered by a UI filterCell Method.
Returns:
